name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allegro Customer Service Helper with Open AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provide canned responses by Open AI when you message with customers in Allegro

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allegro Customer Service Helper is a Chrome extension to help Allegro seller message with customers smoothly. It a free tool like Crisp magicRply or Drift GPT. Simply select the customer's question, then Allegro Customer Service Helper will feedback the reply advice that given by GPT-3.5 Chatbot.

üöÄ Feature
‚óè Provide canned responses or reply template by ChatGPT base on the question of customers.
‚óè Simply select the question content.
‚óè Edit feedback from OpenAI in Allegro Customer Service Helper to reply nicely to customers
‚óè Copy content by one click. 
‚óè Multiple output languages.

üöÄ Who is Allegro Customer Service Helper for
Allegro Customer Service Helper is made for Allegro seller, customer service staff or someone need reply customer's question to solve their problem.

üöÄ How to use it
‚û°Ô∏è Make sure you have a ChatGPT account
‚û°Ô∏è Simply select any online content by your mouse
‚û°Ô∏è Right Click your mouse to open menu and select "Allegro Customer Service Helper" to open the extension window
‚û°Ô∏è Choose what languages you need, and click "Ask for template"
‚û°Ô∏è The canned responses will displayed in the extension window in a minute.
